channel.title: dmx on Jeff Glass

item.title: Demilight Version 0.8.1
item.description:
The newest round of Demilight PCBs and 3D-Prints have taken shape as version 0.8.1. Here's a brief video overview of the current state of thing:
The biggest change, as I mention in the video, is that I tried out JLCPCB's surface mount parts assembly service for the firs time. Overall, I'm very satisfied, and I'm delighted to have such a useful shortcut for assembly of these PCBs. The version 0.
